race_overlay.nutrition: Target 60–80g carbs/hour for Spirit World 100’s 100 miles. Start fueling within the first 30 minutes — early fueling prevents late-race collapse. Bonking at mile 60 is a nutrition failure, not a fitness failure.
race_overlay.altitude: Moderate altitude at Spirit World 100. Arrive 2–3 days early. Reduce intensity expectations by 5–10%. Hydrate aggressively.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Spirit World 100 requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on arizona desert gravel to build confidence. Expect: arizona desert, 100-mile, regional event.
